scripts.roll: npm run build && npm run publish
scripts.local:get: npm run build GetResourcesFunction && sam local invoke -d 5858 --env-vars app/config/local.env.json --event app/src/get_resources/input.json GetResourcesFunction
scripts.local:create: npm run build CreateStacksFunction && sam local invoke -d 5858 --env-vars app/config/local.env.json --event app/src/create_stacks/input.json CreateStacksFunction
scripts.local:deploy: npm run build DeployStackFunction && sam local invoke -d 5858 --env-vars app/config/local.env.json --event app/src/deploy_stack/input.json DeployStackFunction
scripts.local:status: npm run build CheckStatusFunction && sam local invoke -d 5858 --env-vars app/config/local.env.json --event app/src/check_status/input.json CheckStatusFunction
scripts.local:prune: npm run build TriageStacksFunction && sam local invoke -d 5858 --env-vars app/config/local.env.json --event app/src/triage_stacks/input.json TriageStacksFunction
scripts.local:delete: npm run build DeleteStackFunction && sam local invoke -d 5858 --env-vars app/config/local.env.json --event app/src/delete_stack/input.json DeleteStackFunction
scripts.local:ingest: npm run build IngestAlertFunction && sam local invoke -d 5858 --env-vars app/config/local.env.json --event app/src/ingest_alert/input.json IngestAlertFunction
scripts.local:cleanup: npm run build CleanupResourcesFunction && sam local invoke -d 5858 --env-vars app/config/local.env.json --event app/src/cleanup_resources/input.json CleanupResourcesFunction
